test_module.name: sanity/cgcs/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC
SET HOST_IP $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat SET HOST_USER $env.NODE.target.Connect.ssh_user SET HOST_PASSWD $env.NODE.target.Connect.ssh_pass
Con1SSH PROMPTTIMEOUT 60 SEC Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:\~#\s)|(.*:\~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
Con1SSH TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE export TMOUT=0\n Con1SSH WAIT 10 SEC Con1SSH SINK 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE cd\n Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE echo executing ${WASSP_TC_NAME}\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC
Con1SSH FAILIF FAIL
Con1SSH CALL ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/ta80733_test_flavor_combinations.elt HOST_IP=${HOST_IP} HOST_USER=${HOST_USER} HOST_PASSWD=${HOST_PASSWD}
Con1SSH WAIT ${noseTestTimeout} SEC (.*:\~#\s)|(.*:\~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
PASS
